summary: REQ-64 and REQ-65 appear implemented via a new public “Install on Android” in-app entry point (/install-android) with PWA + APK guidance, and updated Android build documentation including CAPACITOR_SERVER_URL/.env.capacitor, HTTPS requirement for Internet Identity, and the debug APK output path. Some additional changes (e.g., service worker registration) were introduced beyond the explicit request.

hallucinated_features.description: Automatic service worker registration for PWA support added at app startup (beyond just adding install guidance).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on an in-app install entry point and documentation for APK/PWA instructions; it does not request implementation changes to enable PWA/service worker behavior.

hallucinated_features.description: Repository documentation index page added/updated (docs README) beyond the specific requirement to update frontend/docs/android.md.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-65 only specifies keeping frontend/docs/android.md accurate; adding/modifying frontend/docs/README.md is not explicitly requested.
